projects.name: Speed optimization of Linux based Embedded Systems
projects.info: Increased speed of a Spherical Geometry calculation code by 4.95 times against a goal of 3.7 times on a Cortex-A72 processor. The code uses trigonometric methods for calculations. Used perf tool to generate profiling information.

projects.name: Touchscreen control of LED brightness using RTOS
projects.info: The project shares access of ADC between 2 tasks: 1. To get touch input from touchscreen by computing voltage across voltage dividers. 2. Measurement of current flowing through a HBLED in a time critical manner. The current is regulated using a buck converter.

projects.name: Motion detector program using non preemptive scheduling
projects.info: Improved responsiveness of a motion detector program using non preemptive scheduling. The program reads data from an accelerometer over I2C and blinks an RGB led to indicate motion.

projects.name: C-- Bitcode generator
projects.info: Implemented C-- a subset of C programming language using parser generators Flex & Bison to generate code in LLVM IR.

projects.name: USB Touch Keyboard
projects.info: Implemented a USB Keyboard using FRDM KL25Z development board. The code uses HID protocol of the USB stack to communicate with host device.

projects.name: Memory size optimization of Embedded Systems
projects.info: Reduced the amount of memory needed for an RTOS-based application on Cortex-M based processor. Reduction of RAM and ROM by 2348 bytes and 3000 bytes, respectively.

projects.name: Speed optimization of Embedded System
projects.info: Achieved 4.3x improvement in execution speed of a program which decodes and displays on the LCD all JPEG images in the root directory of a uSD card.

projects.name: Cache Simulator
projects.info: Project Implements a flexible cache and memory hierarchy simulator and uses it to study the performance of memory hierarchies using the SPEC benchmarks.

projects.name: Branch prediction simulator
projects.info: Designed a branch predictor simulator and use it to design branch predictors (bi-modal, gShare, hybrid) with Branch Target buffer well suited to the SPECint95 benchmarks.

projects.name: Dynamic Instruction Scheduling Simulator

projects.name: Braille reader
projects.info: Fabricated a device to convert text feed from a computer into braille text on a physical device. The device uses 2 motors to control braille characters mounted on a wheel to change characters.
